invalidTenant.title: Invalid Tenant
invalidTenant.message: The tenant specified in the URL is not valid or does not exist.
invalidTenant.help: Please contact your administrator or use a valid tenant URL.

private.languageExample: Example: This message changes with the language!

contextualSearch.title: Contextual Search
contextualSearch.description1: Contextual Search is a feature that uses RegManager's AI to find processes based on the context of what you're looking for, not just keywords.
contextualSearch.description2: For example: "processes related to platform inspections" or "documents about operational safety".
contextualSearch.description3: The system analyzes the content of processes and returns the most relevant results according to the context of your search, providing a more intuitive and efficient experience.

language.title: Language Settings
language.description: This is the system language configuration area. By selecting one of the options below, the entire RegManager interface will be automatically translated to your chosen language, including menus, buttons, messages, and other text elements. The change is applied instantly and your preference will be saved for future sessions.

common.agreement: By signing in, you agree to our
common.selectLanguage: The platform is available in PT and EN. Select your preferred language.

genai.title: Regulatory Data Enhanced by GenAI and Automation
genai.modal_text:
You are interacting with the test version of RegManager's Generative AI. The answers are automatic and based on processed documents. This test version has performance and response time limitations.

Currently, 12 processes from the Inspection: Interdiction category are available for queries through this AI:
  • 48610.200270/2025-23 - Petrobras (West Tellus)
  • 48610.201628/2025-35 - Petroreconcavo (Miranga)
  • 48610.202573/2025-81 - Petrobras (SPM - 14)
  • 48610.204217/2025-00 - Petrobras (FPSO ADR)
  • 48610.204494/2025-12 - Equinor (Valaris)
  • 48610.206752/2025-97 - Petrobras (PCH 2)
  • 48610.208052/2025-37 - PRIO Bravo (Polvo A)
  • 48610.209658/2025-90 - Petrobras (P-53)
  • 48610.227536/2025-85 - Petrobras (NS Tidal Action)
  • 48610.219566/2025-18 - PRIO Jaguar (Hunter Queen)
  • 48610.221768/2025-20 - Equinor (FPSO Peregrino)
  • 48610.227416/2025-88 - 3R Potiguar (109 installations)
genai.modal_text_tenant3:
You are interacting with the test version of RegManager's Generative AI. The answers are automatic and based on processed documents. This test version has performance and response time limitations.

Currently, 5 processes from the Inspection: Fuel Supply, Production of Fuels and Biofuels Facilities category are available for queries through this AI:
  • 48640.200585/2025-13 - Vibra (Posto Ferrpaol Ltda)
  • 48640.200586/2025-68 - Vibra (Auto Posto Ferreira e Levenhagem Ltda.)
  • 48620.201339/2025-17 - Vibra (Auto Posto Frango Japa Ltda.)
  • 48620.201396/2025-04 - Vibra (Posto São Sebastião)
  • 48640.200037/2025-93 - Vibra (Posto da Gruta Ltda)
genai.placeholder: Send a message to RegManager's AI
genai.test_version: You are using the test version of RegManager's Generative AI. GenAI responses are only available for processes in the "Last Updates" tab. This version has performance and response time limitations.
genai.test_version_public: You are using the test version of RegManager's Generative AI. This version has performance and response time limitations.
genai.disclaimer: RegManager AI may make mistakes. Please verify important information.

errors.network: Unable to connect to the AI service. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.timeout: The request took too long to complete. Please try again with a shorter question.
errors.serviceUnavailable: The AI service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few moments.
errors.server: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.
errors.badRequest: Unable to process your message. Please rephrase and try again.
errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
